text:
Fox 2 put out a heading stating "Mississippi officer fired after dashcam footage appears to show him using stun gun on handcuffed man"

It did not appear to, it clearly shows what he did beyond the shadow of a doubt.

tweets.text: Like everything else, the Conservatives cite no evidence to suggest that the bail system has anything whatsoever to do with gun crimes.  Likely because the statistics likely show relatively few people who get bail for gun crimes, and a tiny number who have ever violated bail /7
facts that could save your life. https://t.co/iJvetRpZ4t

https://t.co/F3P087ydzp

We stand with them now and always. Together we will end the corruption that perpetuates senseless violence. #RoadToChange⁠ ⁠ https://t.co/gOUAm2gXjc

It's time to elect leaders who will take on the @NRA and pass gun safety reform. I'm the veteran, ironworker, and gun owner who will get it done.

Watch our new ad, then chip in to help us put it on air: https://t.co/PkSNuOlGWe https://t.co/P1NaG5p7lK

@SammieN49075952 @juanG426 @realDonaldTrump Age you serious? As soon as you have money and a gun.. you have rights on folks don't being as powerful as you? This kind of misthinking will lead us to the wall

The bail system has significant protections in place where there is evidence of a risk to public safety, or for certain serious crimes.. Gun crimes are one suc crime.  If you are charged, the onus is on you to prove why you should be released /6
